item.title: Lawnicons 1.1.0 has arrived! This release includes 626 icons (218 linked icons and 408 made from scratch icons) and works with Lawnchair 12 Alpha 5 and Lawnchair 12.1+. Thanks to all our contributors! (https://github.com/LawnchairLauncher/lawnicons/graphs/contributors) Download it here: http://lawnchair.app/downloads
item.dc:creator: @lawnchairapp
item.description:
Lawnicons 1.1.0 has arrived! This release includes 626 icons (218 linked icons and 408 made from scratch icons) and works with Lawnchair 12 Alpha 5 and Lawnchair 12.1+. Thanks to all our contributors! (github.com/LawnchairLauncher‚Ä¶)
Download it here: lawnchair.app/downloads

item.title:
It's update time! We updated the http://lawnchair.app website, and released Lawnchair 12.1 Alpha 4. Some major changes include: ‚Ä¢ Custom swipe gestures ‚Ä¢ A new color picker ‚Ä¢ Lock home screen ‚Ä¢ New search engines
Check the full changelog here: https://github.com/LawnchairLauncher/lawnchair/releases/tag/v12.1.0-alpha.4
item.dc:creator: @lawnchairapp
item.description:
It's update time!
We updated the lawnchair.app website, and released Lawnchair 12.1 Alpha 4. Some major changes include:
‚Ä¢ Custom swipe gestures
‚Ä¢ A new color picker
‚Ä¢ Lock home screen
‚Ä¢ New search engines

Check the full changelog here:
github.com/LawnchairLauncher‚Ä¶

item.title:
RT by @lawnchairapp: We have never claimed copyright for these features, we have always said that they are taken from the Pixel Launcher and we have never hidden this fact from our community.
Also, reverse engineering is not a crime.
https://www.eff.org/issues/coders/reverse-engineering-faq
item.dc:creator: @divadsn
item.description:
We have never claimed copyright for these features, we have always said that they are taken from the Pixel Launcher and we have never hidden this fact from our community.

Also, reverse engineering is not a crime.

eff.org/issues/coders/revers‚Ä¶

item.title: RT by @lawnchairapp: So i came across this developer and this developer just copied 2 launcher apps from lawnchair he even still with the features claiming that it's his launcher can you guys please help me to report as copycat
item.dc:creator: @Sean56010603
